songs.title: Sundown - Live At Rexall Place, Edmonton, AB / March 10, 2017
songs.lyrics:
I can see her layin' back in her satin dress
In a room where you do what ya don't confess
Sundown you better take care
If I find you creepin' 'round my back stairs
Sundown you better take care
If I find you creepin' 'round my back stairs

She was lookin' like a queen in a sailor's dream
And she don't always say what she really means
Sometimes I think it's a shame
When I get feelin' better but I'm feelin' no pain
Sometimes I think it's a shame
When I get feelin' better but I'm feelin' no pain

Yeah I can picture every move that a man could make
Gettin' lost in her lovin' is your first mistake
Sundown you better take care
If I find you been creepin' 'round my back stairs
Sundown you better take care
If I find you been creepin' 'round my back stairs

Alright let's play one

Yeah I can see her lookin' fast in her faded jeans
She's a hard lovin' woman, got me feelin' mean
Sometimes I think it's a shame
When I get feelin' better when I'm feelin' no pain
Sundown you better take care
If I find you been creepin' 'round my back stairs
Sundown you better take care
If I find you been creepin' 'round my back stairs
Yeah sometimes I think it's a sin
If I find you've been on my losin' side again

Yeah one more time

Yeah sometimes I think it's a sin
If I find you've been on my losin' side again
